title: How do I gain levels?
body:
How do I gains level here? It says I need to be level 7 to do certain things, I'm level 45 in-game. 



 help pls{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Lucky for you this boards level is directly tied to your summoner level! No leveling up required ^_^!!

Unlucky enough, sometimes they get out of sync for some reason. Posting here typically forces through a sync, which looks like it worked, but in the future, you can always use the Profile Syncing Tool stickied at the top of H&S.

Posting for the first time, or using the [syncing tool](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool) will update your forum level with your ingame level.
